PHRASE.LANG: A crystal said to have been carved into the shape of a skull by an ancient tribe.\nIt has an extremely meticulous form that even modern technology has had trouble replicating.
Un cristal en forme de crâne dont on dit qu'il fut sculpté par une tribu antique.\nSa forme est tellement détaillée que même la technologie moderne a eu du mal à le répliquer.
Ein Kristall, der von einem uralten Stamm in die Form eines Schädels gearbeitet worden sein soll.\nEr hat eine extrem genaue Form, die sich auch mit moderner Technik nur schwer nachbilden lässt.
Si dice che un'antica tribù abbia dato a questo cristallo la foggia di un teschio.\nLa forma è talmente accurata che perfino la moderna tecnologia fatica a replicarla.
Un cristal tallado en forma de calavera, al parecer por una antigua civilización.\nSu forma extremadamente detallista es difícil de replicar incluso para la tecnología moderna.
古代人が水晶を磨きあげて作ったとされるドクロ。\n現代の技術でも成形するのが困難な造形物である。
고대인이 수정을 연마해 만들었다고 하는 해골.\n현재의 기술로도 성형이 어려운 조형물이다.
A skull said to be made of polished crystal by the ancients.\nIt would be nearly impossible to create with modern-day technology.
古代人將水晶琢磨而成的骷髏頭。\n即使是現代的技術也很難成形的高難度造型物。
古代人將水晶琢磨而成的骷髏頭。\n即使是現代的技術也很難成形的高難度造型物。
A crystal said to have been carved into the shape of a skull by an ancient tribe.\nIt has an extremely meticulous form that even modern technology has had trouble replicating.
